subject: RE: [junit] how to test JSP pages
msgSnippet: ... The most important and effective technique is to extract all the logic from the JSP into POJOs and test them the usual way... Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Hi All,
> I have one JSP page which takes some data from DB and
> display's it. Connecting to DB, getting the data and
> displaying it all are handled in jsp page itself as scriplets.
> Now i want to test this JSP page.
> So how can i go about this JSP page testing.
> I m new to this type of testing. I m not getting the
> exact idea. What are the technologies to be used?

The most important and effective technique is to extract all the logic from
the JSP into POJOs and test them the usual way...

Cheers, Ilja
